original_text: The other officers then quickly took their coats. They put them on the stone steps for Jehu to walk on. Then they made a loud noise with a trumpet. They shouted, ‘Jehu is king!’
korean_text: 무리가 각각 자기의 옷을 급히 가져다가 섬돌 위 곧 예후의 밑에 깔고 나팔을 불며 이르되 예후는 왕이라 하니라

sentences.original_text: The other officers then quickly took their coats.
They put them on the stone steps for Jehu to walk on.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여호가 밟을 수 있도록 돌계단에 겉옷을 펼쳤다.

sentences.original_text: Then they made a loud noise with a trumpet.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나팔을 불어 큰 소리를 냈다.
